report.title: Species counts league for event
report.description: An event (date and survey) filtered league table of taxon counts by location. Requires the spatial index builder.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l1 JOIN ( SELECT l.id, count(distinct o.taxon_meaning_id) as count FROM locations l JOIN (index_locations_samples ils JOIN samples s on s.id=ils.sample_id JOIN surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id JOIN cache_occurrences_functional o ON o.website_id=su.website_id AND o.survey_id=su.id AND o.sample_id=ils.sample_id AND o.record_status<>'R' #filters# ) ON ils.location_id=l.id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND l.deleted=false AND l.location_type_id=#location_type_id# AND l.public=true AND (l.code NOT LIKE ('%+%') OR l.code IS NULL) GROUP BY l.id, l.name ) as l2 ON l2.id=l1.id

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.
